</head>
<body bgcolor="#ffffff" style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit
10(g)</font><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">AGREEMENT</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>THIS AGREEMENT (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Agreement</font>&#8221;) is made
as of the 16th day of December, 2005, among ALLETE, Inc., a Minnesota
corporation (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ALLETE</font>&#8221;), Wisconsin
Public Service Corporation, a Wisconsin corporation (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">WPSC</font>&#8221;) and WPS
Investments, LLC, a Wisconsin limited liability company (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">WPSI</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;WPSC
and WPSI are sometimes referred to herein collectively as &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">WPS</font>.&#8221;&#160;&#160;Each
of ALLETE, WPSC and WPSI is sometimes referred to herein as a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Party</font>&#8221; or
collectively as the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Parties</font>.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>WHEREAS, WPSC and ALLETE were
originally joint applicants in connection with the construction of a 345 kV
transmission line, which is planned to run from ALLETE&#8217;s Arrowhead substation
located near Duluth, Minnesota to American Transmission Company LLC&#8217;s (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATCLLC</font>&#8221;) Weston
substation, located near Wausau, Wisconsin (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Project</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>WHEREAS, in connection with the initial
joint development of the Project, WPSC and ALLETE agreed that ALLETE would have
the right to purchase a portion of the Project located in Wisconsin (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Project Right</font>&#8221;);
and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>WHEREAS, the primary responsibility for
the Project was transferred to ATCLLC in 2003, pursuant to the November 8, 2002
agreement among ATCLLC, ATC Management Inc. (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATCMI</font>&#8221;) (ATCLLC and
ATCMI may be collectively referred to herein as &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATC</font>&#8221;), WPSC and WPSI
(WPSC and WPSI may be collectively referred to herein as &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">WPS</font>&#8221;) (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Transfer</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Agreement</font>&#8221;), and as
approved by the Public Service Commission of Wisconsin (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">PSCW</font>&#8221;) in Docket
05-AE-115 (Order dated April 17, 2003), and by the Federal Energy Regulatory
Commission (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">FERC</font>&#8221;) in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">American Transmission Co. LLC, et
al.,</font> 102 FERC &#182; 62,172 (2003);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the
promises and mutual agreements herein contained, the Parties hereby agree as
follows:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Purpose of
Agreement</font>.&#160;&#160;The Parties have determined it is preferable that,
rather than<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>exercising its Project
Right, ALLETE or ALLETE&#8217;s designated affiliate (collectively<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>referred to herein as
&#8220;ALLETE&#8221;), funds a portion of ATC&#8217;s monthly capital calls to WPS<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>pursuant to the Transfer
Agreement (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Project
Capital Calls</font>&#8221;); and in exchange for ALLETE&#8217;s funding of such Project
Capital Calls, ALLETE receives Member Units (as such term is defined in the
ATCLLC Operating Agreement dated as of January 1, 2001) in ATCLLC, and Class A
Common Stock (as such term is defined in the ATCMI Shareholders Agreement dated
as of January 1, 2001) in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATCMI</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>ALLETE is willing to relinquish its
Project Right in exchange for funding $60 million in project Capital Calls by
the end of 2006.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ALLETE Participation in
Project Capital Calls</font>.&#160;&#160;The Parties hereby acknowledge and
agree<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>that:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">i.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Project Capital
Calls</font>:&#160;&#160;Commencing with the first Project Capital Call on or
after<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>the
Effective Date (as defined in Section 5 below) and subject to the terms of
this<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Agreement, ALLETE shall
fund 72% of each Project Capital Call; provided<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>however, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">if the
Effective date occurs after the December 2005 Project Capital Call, but before
the January 2006 Project Capital Call, is funded, ALLETE shall fund 78% of each
Project Capital Call beginning with the January 2006 Project Capital Call. If
the Effective Date occurs after the January 2006 Project Capital Call has been
funded, the Parties shall cooperate in good faith to modify ALLETE&#8217;s percentage
participation in Project Capital Calls by the end of 2006. If, following the May
2006 Project Capital Call, the Parties reasonably determine that ALLETE&#8217;s
then-current percentage participation in Project Capital Calls will not likely
result in ALLETE being able to fund $60 million in Project Capital Calls by the
end of 2006, then the Parties shall agree to a one-time increase to ALLETE&#8217;s
percentage participation in Project Capital Calls, beginning with the June 2006
Project Capital Call. Such increased participation percentage will not exceed
100% of such Project Capital Calls but will be based on an intent to modify
ALLETE&#8217;s percentage participation to allow ALLETE to fund a total of $60 million
in Project Capital Calls by the end of 2006.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Funding of Project Capital
Calls</font>: In the event that WPS, under the ATC-WPS<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Agreement (as such term
is defined in Section 6(b) below), has the right to refuse<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>to participate in a
Project Capital Call, ALLETE shall also have the right, but not<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>the obligation, to refuse
to participate in such Project Capital Call.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Termination of Project
Right</font>.&#160;&#160;Upon ALLETE&#8217;s funding of a total of $60 million in<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Project Capital
Calls by the end of 2006, or in the event of WPS&#8217;s termination of<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>this Agreement in
accordance with Section 7(i) below, ALLETE&#8217;s Project Right<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>shall automatically
terminate; provided, however, if ALLETE is not offered the opportunity to fund a
total of $60 million in Project Capital Calls by the end of 2006, then the
Parties shall negotiate in good faith an amendment to this Agreement that
preserves and reinstates, to the maximum extent possible, each Party&#8217;s benefits
of the bargain as set forth in this Agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Transaction
Documents</font>.&#160;&#160;In order to effectuate the transaction contemplated
in this<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Agreement, the Parties
acknowledge and agree that the following agreements must<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>be fully executed and
delivered in addition to this Agreement:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">i.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
Transfer Agreement Amendment, as defined in Section 9 below, among ATCLLC,
ATCMI, WPSC and WPSI;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
Operating Agreement between ATCLLC and ALLETE; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">iii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Subscription
Agreement among ATCLLC, ATCMI and ALLETE.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>This Agreement and the agreements
listed in subsections (i) through (iii) above are collectively referred to
herein as the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Transaction
Documents</font>.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Term and Effective
Date</font>. The term of this Agreement shall commence as of the<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>date first written above
and shall expire when ALLETE has funded $60 million in<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Project Capital Calls,
unless extended or earlier terminated as provided herein<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>(&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Term</font>&#8221;). The &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Effective Date</font>&#8221; shall
be the date on which all Required Approvals, as set forth in Section 9 below,
have been received and all Transaction Documents have been fully executed and
delivered.</font></div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Representations and
Warranties</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">a.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Each
of the Parties hereby represents and warrants to each of the other Parties that,
from and after the Effective Date:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">i.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;This
Agreement and that other Transaction Documents to which it is a party constitute
valid and binding obligations of such Party, enforceable against it in
accordance with their respective terms, except as such enforceability may be
limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, or similar laws or equitable remedies
affecting creditors&#8217; rights generally;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;There
are no lawsuits, claims, complaints or investigations pending, or to its
knowledge threatened, against it, by any governmental entity or third party that
would reasonably be likely to prohibit, or otherwise have a materially adverse
consequence on, the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and that other
Transaction Documents to which it is a party;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">iii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;It
has obtained all consents, authorizations and approvals, and taken all other
actions, that are required for it to execute, deliver and perform its
obligations under this Agreement and the other Transaction Documents to which it
is a party; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">iv.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
execution, delivery and performance by it of this Agreement and the other
Transaction Documents to which it is a party will not: result in a material
breach under any agreements to which it is a party, or constitute a violation of
any applicable federal, state or local governmental law, regulation or
order.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">b.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Each
of WPSC and WPSI further represents and warrants to ALLETE that: (i) all
agreements between it and ATCLLC and/or ATCMI, which relate to the Project and
are reasonably necessary for WPSC and WPSI to cede to ALLETE a&#160;percentage
of their rights to participate in Project Capital Calls as set forth herein (the
&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATC-WPS
Agreements</font>&#8221;), are in full force and effect; and (ii) neither it nor ATC
is in violation of breach under any of the ATC-WPS Agreements, and it has
received no notice and has no knowledge of any claim alleging a violation or
breach under the ATC-WPS Agreements, which would reasonably be likely to
prohibit or otherwise materially affect the transactions contemplated by this
Agreement and the other Transaction Documents to which it is a party. WPSC and
WPSI shall promptly notify ALLETE in writing of any party&#8217;s termination,
violation or breach, or claim or notice therefor, under any of the ATC-WPS
Agreements. Any termination of the ATC-WPS Agreements, before the termination of
the Project Right under Section 3 above, shall have no effect on the Project
Right.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Parties&#8217; representations and warranties set forth in this Section 6 shall
survive until the earlier of the expiration of the Term or termination of this
Agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Termination</font>.&#160;&#160;This
Agreement may be terminated upon prior, written notice:</font></div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">i.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;by
either WPS or ALLETE if any representation or warranty made by the other Party
under this Agreement or any of the other Transaction Documents shall prove to
have been materially false or misleading when made or ceases to remain true
during the Term or if the other Party breaches any of its obligations under this
Agreement, if such cessation or breach would reasonably be expected to have a
materially adverse consequence on the other Party or the transactions
contemplated in the Transaction Documents, provided that, if cure of the
underlying condition that resulted in the untruth or cure of the breach would
result in it having no materially adverse consequence on the other Party or the
transactions contemplated in the Transaction Documents, such condition or breach
has not been cured within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice from
the other Party;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ii.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
by ALLETE in the event of ATC&#8217;s: (i) dissolution or liquidation;
(ii)&#160;assignment of any of its rights under the Transaction Documents for
the benefit of creditors; or (iii) voluntarily filing, or having filed against
it, a petition in bankruptcy or insolvency or for reorganization or arrangement
under United States bankruptcy laws or the insolvency act of any State;
or</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">iii.&#160;&#160;&#160;
by ALLETE for all future Project Capital Calls in the event that any of the
agreements described in Section 4(i) &#8211; (iii) above expires or is terminated;
provided however, if ALLETE terminates this Agreement under this subpart (iii),
the Parties shall negotiate in good faith an amendment to this Agreement that
preserves and reinstates, to the maximum extent possible, each Party&#8217;s benefits
of the bargain as set forth in this Agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Assignment</font>.&#160;&#160;The
Parties&#8217; respective rights and obligations under this Agreement<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>may be assigned only with
the written consents of the other Parties hereto, which<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>consents shall not be
unreasonably withheld or unduly delayed; <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">provided
however</font>,<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>any Party may, without
the other Parties&#8217; consents, assign all or part of its rights and obligations
hereunder to its affiliated company including, without limitation, its successor
in interest by way of merger, consolidation or sale of all or substantially all
of its assets. This Agreement shall be binding upon and shall inure to the
benefit of the Parties, their respective successors and permitted assigns, but
shall not confer any rights or remedies upon any third party. Any purported
assignment of this Agreement without the written consent of the other Parties,
if required hereunder, shall be null and void.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Regulatory and Other
Required Approvals</font>. This agreement is expressly conditioned<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>on: (i) the PSCW&#8217;s
approval of an amendment to the Transfer Agreement, to<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>facilitate ALLETE&#8217;s
participation in Project Capital Calls as set forth in Sections 1<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>and 2 above (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Transfer Agreement
Amendment</font>&#8221;); (ii) FERC 203 approval of ALLETE&#8217;s acquisition of Member
Units in ATCLLC and Class A Common Stock in ATCMI; and (iii) the approval of the
ATCMI Board of Directors, which is attached as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit A</font> hereto and
made a part here of (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATCMI Board of Directors&#8217;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Approval</font>&#8221;).
(Collectively, subparts (i), (ii) and (iii) are referred to herein as
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Required Approvals</font>.&#8221;)
The Parties shall cooperate in good faith in seeking all<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Required Approvals
necessary to effectuate this Agreement and the other<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>Transaction Documents. If
a Party receives notice, or otherwise becomes aware,<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>that another regulatory
approval is required in order to effectuate this Agreement or the other
Transaction Documents, such Party shall notify the other Parties via telephone
as soon as practicable, and they shall cooperate in good faith to obtain such
additional regulatory approval as expeditiously as possible.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Severability</font>. If: (i)
any term of this Agreement is determined to be invalid, illegal or<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>unenforceable by any
court or governmental authority having jurisdiction; or (ii)<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>one or more of the
Required Approvals set forth in Section 9 above is not obtained<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>by May 15, 2006, or is
denied or conditioned in a manner that materially adversely affects a Party&#8217;s
respective benefits and obligations hereunder, then the parties shall negotiate
in good faith a new provision or new agreement that will be legally enforceable,
or gain such Required Approvals as applicable, and to the maximum extent
possible, restore each Party&#8217;s Benefits of the bargain contained in this
Agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Counterparts</font>. This
Agreement may be executed in any number of separate<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>counterparts, each of
which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which<font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;</font>together shall constitute
one and the same agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 18pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>IN WITNESS WHEREOF, this Agreement has
be executed and delivered by the Parties hereto on the date first written
above.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">EXHIBIT
A</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ATCMI BOARD OF DIRECTORS&#8217;
APPROVAL</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">UNANIMOUS
CONSENT TO ACTION BY THE DIRECTORS</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">OF ATC
MANAGEMENT INC.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ADMISSION
OF ALLETE, INC., OR ITS DESIGNATED SUBSIDIARY,</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">AS A
MEMBER OF ATCLLC</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>The undersigned, constituting all of
the members of the Board of Directors of ATC Management Inc. (&#8220;ATCMI&#8221;), a
Wisconsin corporation, pursuant to Section 3.5(c) of the Amended and Restated
Bylaws of ATCMI and the provisions of Wis. Stat. &#167; 180.0821, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">hereby
adopt the following resolution by unanimous written consent as though adopted by
them at a duly constituted meeting of the Board of Directors:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RESOLVED</font>, that pursuant to the
authority granted to the Board of Directors in Section 3.1 of the Operating
Agreement of American Transmission Company LLC to admit new members to American
Transmission Company LLC (&#8220;ATCLLC&#8221;) upon such terms and conditions as the Board
deems appropriate, and pursuant to the authority granted in Section 3.1 of the
Amended and Restated Bylaws of ATCMI, ALLETE, Inc. or a subsidiary that it
designates (&#8220;ALLETE&#8221;) is hereby approved for membership in ATCLLC.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>ALLETE shall be allowed to purchase
membership units in ATCLLC and purchase shares of ATCMI Class A Common Stock at
a share price of Ten Dollars ($10.00) per share, in proportion to its total
membership interest in ATCLLC all as further described below.</font></div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>ALLETE will be allowed to purchase
ATCLLC membership units by funding a portion of ATCLLC&#8217;s Arrowhead-Weston
Project Capital Calls (&#8220;Project Capital Calls&#8221;) pursuant to sections 5.b., 5.c.
and 6 of the Agreement for Transfer of Primary Responsibility For
Arrowhead-Weston Transmission Project, as amended by the Fist and Second
Amendments (&#8220;Transfer Agreement&#8221;) attached as Exhibit A.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>To effectuate ALLETE&#8217;s and WPS&#8217; intent
that ALLETE purchase $60 million of membership units in ATCLLC by the end of
2006 which would otherwise have been purchased by WPSI by participation in
Project Capital Calls, ALLETE is allowed to purchase membership units reflecting
72 percent of each monthly Project Capital Call commencing in min December 2005;
provided however:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 99pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">-&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If
      ALLETE is not authorized to purchase ATCLLC membership units until after
      the December 2005 Project Capital Call has been funded, ALLETE shall be
      allowed to purchase membership units reflecting 78 percent of each Project
      Capital Call beginning with the first Project Capital Call following all
      conditions set forth in these resolutions being
  met.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 99pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">-&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If
      ALLETE is not authorized to purchase ATCLLC membership units until after
      the January 2006 Project Capital <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Call
      has been funded, ALLETE&#8217;s percentage participation in Project Capital
      Calls for the remainder of 2006 will be adjusted upward, up to a maximum
      of 100 percent, to target a total purchase of $60 million in membership
      units via participation in Project Capital Calls by the end of 2006, and
      ALLETE shall be allowed to purchase membership units reflecting such
      increased percentage participation in Project Capital
      Calls.</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 99pt">
                <div>
                  <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">-
      &#160;</font></div>
                </div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If
      following the May 2006 Project Capital Call, it is reasonably determined
      that ALLETE&#8217;s then-current percentage participation in Project Capital
      Calls will not result in its purchase of $60 million in membership units
      via participation in Project Capital Calls by the end of 2006, then, with
      the consent of WPSI, ALLETE&#8217;s percentage participation in the Project
      Capital Calls shall increase as necessary, up to a maximum of 100 percent,
      to target the purchase of $60 million in membership units by the end of
      2006, beginning with the June 2006 Project Capital Call, and ALLETE shall
      be allowed to purchase membership units reflecting such increased
      percentage participation in Project Capital
  Calls.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font>Upon ALLETE&#8217;s purchase of $60 million
in membership units, ALLETE&#8217;s right to purchase membership units via the Project
Capital Calls shall automatically terminate.</font></div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RESOLVED FURTHER</font>, that ALLETE
shall have the right, but not the obligation, to participate in ATCLLC&#8217;s general
equity capital calls on a <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">pro
rata</font> basis in accordance with ALLETE&#8217;s percentage ownership of ATCLLC,
calculated as has been customary or, if changed, as applicable for all ATCLLC
members.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RESOLVED FURTHER</font>, that in
connection with the proceding Resolution, Management is hereby authorized and
directed to execute all documents, containing terms and conditions consistent
with this Resolution, necessary or convenient for the admission of ALLETE to
ATCLLC, receipt of cash, issuance to ALLETE of ATCLLC membership units and
issuance to ALLETE of share of Class A Common Stock of ATCMI, conditioned upon
receipt of all state and federal regulatory approvals, and other such
third-party approvals as necessary.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Dated as
of the 12th day of December, 2005.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

        <div id="FTR">

        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">EXHIBIT
A</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">SECOND
AMENDMENT TO</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">AGREEMENT
FOR TRANSFER OF PRIMARY REPONSIBILITY</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">FOR
ARROWHEAD-WESTON TRANSMISSION PROJECT</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>The parties to the Agreement for
Transfer of Primary Responsibility for Arrowhead-Weston Transmission Project
hereby agree to amend the Agreement as follows:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Section
5.b. of the Agreement is amended to add the following two sentences at the
beginning thereof:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>&#8220;As used in this Section 5.b. and in
Section 6., &#8220;WPSI&#8221; shall mean WPSI or its designee, provided such designee has
been approved for membership in ATCLLC by the Board of Directors of ATCM in
their sole discretion and in accordance with such approval.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>&#8220;As used in this Section 5.b. and in
Section 6., &#8220;WPSC&#8221; shall mean WPSC or its designee, provided such designee has
been approved by the Board of Directors of ATCM in their sole discretion to own
ATCM Class A common stock and in accordance with such approval.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 36pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The
fifth sentence of Section 5.b. after the addition of the two sentences described
in &#8220;1&#8221; above is amended by adding the words &#8220;in total&#8221; after the word
&#8220;purchase.&#8221;</font></div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 36pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;A
new section, Section 5.c. shall be added as follows: </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8220;5.c. If
a person designated by WPSI or WPSC pursuant to Section 5.b. does not purchase
membership units or Class A shares, WPSI and WPSC respectively shall purchase
such membership units or Class A shares.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 27pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Paragraph
11 is deleted and the numbers of the subsequent sections shall not be
changed.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 27pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt"></font>Dated this ____ day of November,
2005.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div>

<DESCRIPTION>ALLETE EXECUTIVE ANNUAL INCENTIVE PLAN AS AMENDED AND RESTATED
